activities: Activities will be any and all activies involving Human Resources management of staff located in the EU.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and Interim CFO
eucountries: Finland, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Any information related to Human Resources for EU based staff.
privacyprograms: ADTRAN is not presently in privacy programs strictly related to Safe Harbor. However, ADTRAN is a TL9000 certified company as well as a publicly held company that is covered by U.S. statutes for financial reporting that requires audits by external Accounting firms as well as ISO auditors that have to annually audit or processes procedures on data protection, access, accuracy of our procedures and processes.
recoursemech: ADTRAN will avail itself to the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) due to the nature of the data being Human resources related.
